com.esri.mo2.util
Class Units

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.util.Units
public class Units
extends Object

This class stores some common units. They are used by components like the ScaleBar and Measure tool.

parseScale

public static double parseScale(String axlScale,
                                int mapUnit)
Parses a scale value supplied by AXL and returns appropriate internal mapUnits/pixel scale.

Parameters:
axlScale - the scale supplied by AXL
mapUnit - the map units specified within AXL
Returns:
the mapUnits/pixel internal scale
Throws:
NumberFormatException - if anything wrong

                                int mapUnit)
Parses an AXL scale value and converts it to a Carto scale.

Parameters:
scalestring - the scale supplied by AXL
mapUnit - the map units
Returns:
the scale value if successful, -1 otherwise

intUnitToString

public static String intUnitToString(int type)
Returns the name of the unit for the given integer type. "Unknown" is returned if the type does not exist.

Parameters:
type - the map units
Returns:
the unit string name

stringUnitToInt

public static int stringUnitToInt(String name)
Returns the type of the unit with the given name. A -1 is returned if the name does not exist.

Parameters:
name - the unit string name
Returns:
the map units if successful, -1 otherwise

getScreenResolution

public static int getScreenResolution()
Determines the screen resolution as dots per inch, assuming there is a screen attached. Otherwise returns a default value (currently = 96).

Returns:
the screen resolution

convert

public static double convert(double value,
                             int fromUnit,
                             int toUnit)
Converts the value in fromUnit to a value in toUnit.

Parameters:
value - the value to convert
fromUnit - the current map units
toUnit - the target map units
Returns:
the converted value

distance

public static double distance(double x1,
                              double y1,
                              double x2,
                              double y2,
                              int fromUnit,
                              int toUnit)
Calculates the distance between two points and converts it from a value in fromUnit to a value in toUnit.

Parameters:
x1 - the X ordinate of the first point
y1 - the Y ordinate of the first point
x2 - the X ordinate of the second point
y2 - the Y ordinate of the second point
fromUnit - the current map units
toUnit - the target units
Returns:
the converted distance
